body.name: L'Oreal Paris Skincare Hydra Genius Daily Liquid Care Oil-Free Face Moisturizer for Extra Dry Skin, Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer for Face with Aloe Water and Hyaluronic Acid, 3.04 fl. oz.
body.stockDetail: Only 4 left in stock - order soon.
features: Lightweight facial moisturizer: This water based moisturizer delivers all the hydration of a face lotion, but in a water-like, quickly absorbing, gel face moisturizer; Leaves skin feeling comfortable, soothed and nourished with moisture
Lotion for extra dry skin: Formulated with Hyaluronic Acid and Aloe Water, this moisturizer for face provides hydration that absorbs quickly and keeps skin hydrated for up to 72 hrs
Hydra Genius: A unique line of daily liquid care moisturizers, formulated with aloe water and 3 types of Hyaluronic Acid for quick absorption and 72H moisture-lock power

Replenish skin with a facial moisturizer: gift your skin a daily dose of hydration from L'Oreal Paris skin care, whether day creams, night creams, or moisturizers with SPF, they provide your skin essential moisture to keep skin healthy

Pair it with: Try using after L’Oréal Paris Revitalift Derm Intensives Hyaluronic Acid facial serum, a fragrance-free, lightweight serum that plumps and hydrates your skin while visibly reducing wrinkles
body.description: For best results, use every morning and night after cleansing, gently smoothing over face - This L’Oreal Paris face moisturizer is suitable for sensitive skin and has been Dermatologist tested for safety

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: L’Oréal Paris Hydra Genius Daily Liquid Moisturizer: Thirsty Skin? Give it a drink. 72HR Long-lasting liquid moisturizer for visibly fresh, glowing skin Lack of sleep, high stress levels, too much celebrating – life can leave you with tired, dull, thirsty skin. Give your thirsty skin a drink with Hydra Genius Daily Liquid Moisturizers. Infused with Hyaluronic Acid and quenching Aloe Water, Hydra Genius is a one-step solution to fresh, water-plumped, beautiful looking skin. These lightweight formulas deliver instant and continuous hydration that lasts as long as your day does.

Aloe Water Found in arid environments, Aloe Vera is a plant with the capacity to store water in its leaves. It is universally acknowledged to contain 75 nutritional elements including 12 minerals, 27 amino acids, and 6 vitamins– including Vitamin C & Vitamin E – providing hydrating and soothing properties. Hyaluronic Acid A naturally occurring molecule found throughout skin known for its ability to enhance moisture-retention and skin-hydration. Liquid Moisturizer Each Hydra Genius Liquid Moisturizer has a unique formula texture to deliver a customized finish for each skin type.

Hydra Genius Daily Liquid Moisturizer Normal/Dry Skin Hydra Genius Daily Liquid Moisturizer Normal/Oily Skin Hydra Genius Daily Liquid Moisturizer Extra Dry Skin Skin Concern Dull, Dehydrated, Tired Skin. Oily, Unbalanced, Overly Shiny Skin. Very Dry, Tight-feeling, Uncomfortable Skin. Skin Benefit 72H Hydration + Glow 72H Hydration + Matte 72H Hydration + Comfort Formula Texture Lightweight, oil-free , water-creamy formula exclusively for Normal/Dry Skin. Air light, non-greasy, oil- free formula exclusively for Normal/Oily Skin. Creamy, non-sticky formula exclusively for Extra Dry Skin glides on easily for quick absorption. Directions For Use Use every morning and night after cleansing, gently smoothing over face. Use every morning and night after cleansing, gently smoothing over face. Use every morning and night after cleansing, gently smoothing over face. Results: Immediately Skin appears radiant & more luminous. Skin feels softer & plumped with hydration. Excess shine is reduced. Skin is plumped with hydration. Skin looks mattified & fresh. Skin is comfortable, soothed and nourished with moisture. Skin is plumped with hydration and it’s moisture barrier is improved. Results: Use After Use Skin appears fresher, healthier & more beautiful. Skin appears less shiny, healthier & more beautiful. Skin looks refreshed and feels clean. Skin appears smoother, healthier & more beautiful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Pros:* Great scent that doesn't bother the skin.* Very lightweight in case you decide to travel with it.* Moisturizes the skin very well for a long time.For the price of the product and what it can do, I would definitely recommend this to anyone that needs a great moisturizer at a great price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thickness scent and not pill under makeup
reviews.reviewText: Fell 10 feet onto cement ladder wrung came loose. My right side of face so bruised and swollen. Luckily nothing major. I usually use L’Oréal makeup but it hurt to try to smooth over cheek. Got this L’Oréal genius. Oh my felt wonderful and cooling. Great under makeup and keeps my 71 year old skin hydrated all day. Can’t find in stores but luckily Amazon had. Highly recommend this product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My first time writing review just because everything about this face cream is amazing. First time user I have fallen for it. Texture, light smell all on n point

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have very dry skin during the winter months. This product is very soothing and helps keep my face moisturized all day so I do not look like a shedding reptile. It does have a fragrance to it, but I like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This skin care product is really hydrating the skin...The smell is pleasant.I like the fact it is in a glass pump not in plastic

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product delivers as all Loreal products do.This is is a very light feeling and leaves a softness to your face

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I use this right after washing my face. It's not oily and feels lite and airy. I have had a hard time finding something that doesn't cause my face to break-out, but this has had no adverse effects on my skin. Love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My face has never felt better
reviews.reviewText: Ever since I've used this my face hasn't felt dry, cracked, or flaky. Even after exfoliation or cold weather the worse my skin has felt is slightly irritated. This has helped keep my face well hydrated.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent replacement for my favorite moisturizer!

reviews.reviewText: He probado muchas marcas buenas y ninguna como ésta. Con 2 gotas me rinde para todo el rostro. Deja una sensación increíblemente fresca, no es grasosa y sigues sintiendo su efecto aún después de ser absorbida. Excelente como base de maquillaje
Thank you so much G.GVery genuine sellers..Great product for dry skin..

reviews.reviewTitle: Better than my high end moisturizers
reviews.reviewText: My new favorite moisturizer! *Writing this review under my hubby's account - LOL!* FIRST let me just say: IF YOU DO NOT HAVE EXTRA DRY SKIN THIS IS NOT FOR YOU, case and point. I have extremely dry skin, and eczema on my face. Most other moisturizers are sucked up and I have to use mega amounts to make a difference, and then they ball off!? This stuff is amazing! It absorbed into my skin so fast and made my makeup apply so smooth. At the end of the day I was - dare I say it - a little on the oily side! Amazing. This is infused with hylaronic acids and aloe vera so it really helps your skin retain moisture. I was sent this to review by GlamSense, but thoughts and opinions are always my own. This moisturizer is quickly replacing my high end favourites. I will also say that this does have a strong scent at first, but the smell does seem to dissipate shortly after, I am sensitive to scents and it did not bother me.

reviews.reviewTitle: beautiful face cream very lightweight and not greasy
reviews.reviewText: Use on my face all the time
